content: knit 1 more st between flap and instep knit the 30 36 42 held instep sts then pick up 1 st between instep and heel flap knit it pick up and knit 16 19 22 sts along heel flap and then knit the remaining 35 42 47 sole sts now you have 30 36 42 instep sts and 52 62 70 sole sts ©caoua coffee 2017 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved moldau v 1 page 3/5 moldau socks - by caoua coffee gusset decreases round 1 instep * k2 yo k3 pyo3k k1 5 6 7 times sole ssk knit to 2 sts before instep k2tog round 2 k all stitches round 3 instep * k1 yo k3 pyo3k k2 5 6 7 times sole ssk knit to 2 sts before instep k2tog round 4 k all sts round 5 instep * yo k3 pyo3k k3 5 6 7 times sole ssk knit to 2 sts before instep k2tog round 6 k all sts round 7 same as round 3 round 8 k all sts round 9 same as round 1 round 10 k all sts round 11 instep * k3 yo k3 pyo3k 5 6 7 times sole ssk knit to 2 sts before instep k2tog round 12 k all sts then restart from round 1 and continue to work gusset rounds until you have worked 22 26 28 rounds total decreasing 11 13 14 times 2 sts note in case you need a longer gusset section because you have a long high instep you could work the sole decrease only every 3rd round after you finished all your decrease rounds there are 30 36 42 instep sts and 30 36 42 sole sts foot continue instep in pattern as established and always knit all sole sts i e no more decreases on the sole and always repeat the 12 pattern row for instep work until foot is approx 4 5 5 5 75 cm / 1 75 2 2 25 inches shorter than desired length toe round a knit all sts round b instep k1 ssk work in pattern1 to 3 sts before end of instep k2tog k1 sole k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of sole k2tog k1 1note end a line of zig-zags and simply knit those sts when the ssk or k2tog at the beginning or the end of the instep would eat up the barred stitch of the zig-zag i e if the yo or the pyo3k comes to within 3 stitches of the beginning or the end of the instep repeat these 2 rounds until you have 32 36 44 sts left on the needles then always work round b until you have only 16 20 20 sts left finishing leaving a tail of at least 20cm / 8 inches break yarn and close the toe using kitchener stitch weave in the ends knit a second sock and enjoy ©caoua coffee 2017 pattern is for non-commercial
